twitterSettings.updated: Twitter Settings aktualisiert mit ID {{ param }}
twitterSettings.maxLikes: Max Likes (number of likes until start doing unlikes)
twitterSettings.hasDefaultProfileImage: Skip If Has Default Profile Image
twitterSettings.accountAgeLessThan: Skip If Account Age Less Than (months, 0 = disabled)
twitterSettings.minActivity: Min Activity (minimum likes, tweets, followers, following)
twitterSettings.followingToFollowersRatio: Following To Followers Ratio (eg. 3, skip if 3 times more following than followers)
twitterSettings.likesToTweetsRatio: Likes To Tweets Ratio (eg. 3, skip if 3 times more likes than tweets)
twitterSettings.notLikeTweetsOlderThan: Skip If Like Tweet Older Than (months, 0 = disabled)
